1448540.name: My Poodle's Diary - Visual Novel
1448540.description:
Step into the gentle world of "My Poodle's Diary," where the life of a black standard poodle named “Calm” unfolds through a series of short stories. This visual novel is designed for animal lovers and anyone who cherishes heartfelt tales of companionship. Immerse yourself in Calm's journey from a lively puppy to a dignified adult, all narrated in beautiful, audio-dubbed storytelling.

Key Features:


  • Fully Narrated:
Each chapter comes to life with full audio narration, enhancing the emotional depth and accessibility of the stories.

  • Early Access:
Start with 30 minutes of story in early access, offering a glimpse into the world of Calm and setting the stage for the adventures to come, released every week.

  • Full Experience:
The complete game will expand to 3-4 hours of narrative, exploring Calm’s adventures and the poignant moments of her life.

  • Beautiful Artwork:
Vivid illustrations capture Calm's evolving story, reflecting the joy and challenges she encounters.

  • Engaging Soundtrack:
A carefully curated soundtrack complements the narrative, enhancing the storytelling with its emotional resonance.

  • For Animal Lovers:
Perfect for anyone who has a special place in their heart for dogs, this game delves into the bonds between pets and their humans.

A Journey of Growth and Love:
"My Poodle's Diary" is more than just a visual novel; it’s an experience that invites you to share in the life of Calm, a poodle whose stories are heartfelt and inspiring. Join us in following her life, one chapter at a time, and see the world through her eyes. Begin your journey with Calm today in early access, with new stories unfolding each week until the full narrative is told.
